title: 01/06/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/06/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, Chris Mannix joins to recap Kyrie Irving's debut. Is there a shot he gets vaccinated? Ross Tucker calls in and shares a story about a former teammate that never wanted to play in games. And Mike Florio discusses the possibility of the Super Bowl getting moved to Dallas.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
